hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Mido's house#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Man in Green's House#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #gold#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Eyedrops#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Kokiri Shop#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #3# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# a melody and boulders conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #the Song of Time#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #the Serenade of Water#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Map of the Deku Tree# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.
